proposal: Diving into the whimsical world of Matt Furie's Pet RAT, where frogs chill, rats are sweet, and dragons act like dogs, it's clear creativity knows no bounds. With 195 holders on the ETH network, why not expand this unique universe? Imagine deploying a DEX or hosting a lottery where your community can trade and win with the same spirit of adventure. Let's blend our tools with your vision, making every interaction an extension of this fantastical journey.
